import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var MyMessage=function MyMessage(_ref){var message=_ref.message;/* This will help us to chack whther our message is text or image
      And if it is our image then it will render the images 
      else we will render the text.
  */if(message.attachments&&message.attachments.length>0){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:message.attachments[0].file,alt:"message-attachment",className:"message-image",style:{float:"right"}});}return/*#__PURE__*/ (/* float: 'right' because we want to come our messages on right side */_jsx("div",{className:"message",style:{float:"right",marginRight:"18px",color:"white",backgroundColor:"#3B2A50"},children:message.text}));};export default MyMessage;
